products.name: Savvy Bundle
products.shortDescription: Get the ultimate! This offer includes unlimited transactions, a platinum cheque and credit card and so much more.
salesHighlights: Platinum cheque and credit cards.
American Express® cheque and credit cards.
The option of an overdraft facility.
Nedbank Greenbacks Money Management membership with double Greenbacks when using your American Express® cards.
Greenbacks SHOP Card.
Free digital banking through online banking, the Nedbank Money app and Cellphone Banking.
Unlimited card swipes.
Unlimited deposits at cash-accepting ATMs.
Unlimited Nedbank ATM cash withdrawals.
Unlimited cash withdrawals at point-of-sale devices at participating retailers.
Unlimited debit orders.
Unlimited stop orders.
Unlimited account payments and interaccount transfers on self-service channels.

eStatements.

products.shortDescription: A no frills, transparent account with a flat monthly fee, pay only for what you use.
salesHighlights: Zero monthly account fee
Free Gold Cheque Card (includes travel insurance)
Free card swipes

products.name: Unlocked.Me
products.shortDescription: Perfect for busy students, through free digital banking, this account gives you quick and easy access to cash.
salesHighlights: ZERO fees on card swipes.
ZERO fees on cash deposits of up to R3 000 at Nedbank ATMs. (Thereafter pay-as-you-use fees will apply).
ZERO fees on internal debit and stop orders
ZERO fees for one external debit order (non-Nedbank).
ZERO data usage when banking with the Nedbank MoneyApp™.
ZERO annual fees on your cheque card.
ZERO fees for balance enquiries and inter-account transfers on the MoneyApp™ and all other self-service platforms
Ability to make online purchases with your card.
Free access to the www.unlocked.me experience and major discounts on the site.
Pay-as-you-use fees will apply on other transactions, see the pricing guide
MyPocket - a free budgeting and savings pocket linked to your bank account. It earns you interest and gives you instant access to your money. For more info click here.

products.name: Young Professional Bundle
products.shortDescription: Are you just setting out in your career? Get fast-tracked into Professional Banking at 50% of the monthly fee.
products.specialFeature: UNDER 30 WITH A MIN 4 YEAR DEGREE
salesHighlights: Relationship services for the entire family including a dedicated relationship banker, 24/7 call & email support and access to lending, invest and financial planning specialists
Unlimited swipes, debit orders and ATM withdrawals

Professional (Platimum Greenbacks) cheque card - contactless enabled. Dual issued with Amex and Visa Signature to ensure wide acceptance as well as to ensure the nest lifestyle, travel and reward benefits possible
American Express® Platinum charge card at 50% discounted annual fee (for the first year only)
Overdraft facility available - additional fees apply
eNotes (SMS notifications)
No-funds alert (low balance notification)
Online banking subscription / Money™ App
Greenbacks rewards subscription
Unlimited access to Bidvest domestic / international departure lounges via your Professional Cheque or Credit Card, when leaving SA
4 free visits to Bidvest domestic / international departure lounges for kids on active Nedbank 4me or Unlocked.me Student accounts
10 International lounge visits via Professional Visa Signature Cheque or Credit Card. Emergency concierge services
Your household automatically qualifies to experience your relationship services
Get automatic travel insurance (for medical emergencies) when paying with your Professional Banking Credit Card
Free forex delivery (foreign cash & travel card) at preferenial rates
100% loans for properties less than R1,5 million at tailored rates
100% loan for vehicle applications less than R400,000
Platinum investment products at exclusive rates. Direct access to Treasury for investments greater than R250,000
Free will drafting. Access to holistic estate & retirement planning
valueAddedServices: Greenbacks (Get rewarded for your everyday spend)
Contactless-enabled cards (tap your card and pay)

eligibilityRules.description: Minimum 4 year degree or 3 years plus Honours (NQF level 8 equivalent)

productCategories.name: Borrow
productCategories.description: I need a loan to help me achieve my goals

productLines.name: PersonalLoan
productLines.description: School fees, unexpected bills, a holiday, 2nd hand vehicle or home renovations? A personal loan can offer you the funds you need.

products.name: Personal Loan
products.shortDescription: A personal loan is an easy and affordable way to better your life. Think about the good that a loan can do for you or your family, and you too can experience how a loan can pay you back.
salesHighlights: Loans available from R2 000 to R300 000*
Flexible repayment periods of 6 to 72 months.
Monthly repayments debited from your bank account.
The best possible interest rate that we can offer you.
Easy application process.
If your loan is approved, we will deposit the money directly into your bank account.

When you take out a personal loan, it is compulsory to have loan protection cover for death, disability and retrenchment. Nedbank Personal Loan Protection Insurance has been specially developed to help pay off your outstanding debt should you be unable to make your loan repayments in the event of your death, disablement or retrenchment. Or you can take out an insurance policy of your choice provided it has all the necessary benefits. Ask about our loan insurance when you apply for your loan.
